1.title: Episode #2.1
1.plot: A-Team legend Mr. T searches the four corners of the earth for some of the biggest fools on the planet. From drivers to dancers , criminals to workmen , drunks to sailors, people jumping off stuff to people getting stuck in things, no stone will be left unturned in his search for the world's most incredible and idiotic imbeciles. World's Craziest...

imdb.title: World's Craziest Fools
plot: Mr T searches out the world's daftest people in articles, CCTV footage and home videos.::Anonymous
synopsis: Mr T searches out the world's daftest people in articles, CCTV footage and home videos.
